title: Random 300 ping games
body: Hello, i switched isps and ever since then i get random games where i just have 280-300 ping for no reason, at first i thought it because of downloads but upon checking teamspeak and speedtest i found out my ping was normal. i can play with high ping, but there's also alot of packet loss that goes with it so it's basically impossible to play.

replies.body:
Hey Manlysloth,

That is no good - what ISP are you using now?

When you switched did you change anything else about your setup (eg. router / wifi settings etc?)

Mindstar
I'm using TPG, but i've found out that's an issue on TPG's side after doing some tests. Thanks for your help, and sorry to be a bother.

Thanks for the update - let me know how you go with TPG!

There are a few players [in this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GGRjBOWc-300-ping-increase-in-games-randomly) as well who might be interested to know your findings.

Cheers
Mindstar
